bibl.title: The Investigation of the Ancient Wall Extending from Aswan to Philae. Second Preliminary Report. With a Contribution on the Pottery from the Watch-Tower at Tell Asmar.

series.title: Mitteilungen des Deutschen Arch√§ologischen Instituts. Abteilung Kairo
MDIK

bibl.note: Indications of use of the portage road during the Ptolemaic period are scarce. Studying the pottery collected from the vicinity of the watch-tower at Tell Asmar, we learn that this control system was particularly active during early Imperial times.
